name: Crouch control
description:
They conduct tests on you, go through them to the end to get cakes.

A/D - go left/right (maybe)

W - jump (probably)

Known bugs:

  • Springs are out of control sometimes (I'm not an expert in platformers, sorry!)
  • Cakes appearing in pause and menu should appear only after finishing the game
  • Music isn't looping (5 minutes before deadline >_>)
